title: Black Rebel Motorcycle Club - Howl - slavetothesound's FLAC
description:
BRMC busts out the harmonica for this one - Howl is not what you&#039;d expect to hear at all if you&#039;ve ever listened to BRMC&#039;s other albums.  It&#039;s a mostly quiet acoustic folk rock album instead of their normal "stoner-drone" hard rock style. Very much worth a few listens. Don&#039;t be put off if you didn&#039;t like their other albums, this one sounds like an entirely different band.

Track list for Howl:
01. Shuffle Your Feet    [0:02:53.44]
02. Howl    [0:04:20.30]
03. Devil&#039;s Waitin&#039;    [0:03:50.51]
04. Ain&#039;t No Easy Way    [0:02:36.61]
05. Still Suspicion Holds You Tight    [0:04:24.70]
06. Fault Line    [0:02:57.23]
07. Promise    [0:04:46.32]
08. Weight Of The World    [0:03:41.10]
09. Restless Sinner    [0:03:11.74]
10. Gospel Song    [0:04:31.17]
11. Complicated Situation    [0:02:37.23]
12. Sympathetic Noose    [0:04:17.35]
13. The Line    [0:08:12.74]

Make sure to listen all the way through - tracks 6, 11, and 12 are my favorites. And many of you have probably heard "Ain&#039;t No Easy Way" before...
Enjoy! And don&#039;t forget to support the artists.
 
- slavetothesound
